title: Support for Relative Path When Selecting XML File
description: Bug 124067: When selecting an XML file, the relative path should be supported.
OB: Currently, when selecting an XML file, only the absolute path is supported.
EB: When selecting an XML file, both relative and absolute paths should be supported.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Create a new report.
2. Select an XML file. The file should use the relative path.
